mapper.insert: insert into cart_tbl(pro_code, mem_id, cart_amount) values (#{pro_code}, #{mem_id}, #{cart_amount}) on duplicate key update cart_amount = cart_amount + #{cart_amount}
mapper.select: select p.pro_code , p.pro_name , p.pro_price , p.pro_up_folder , p.pro_img, c.cart_amount from cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p on c.pro_code = p.pro_code where c.mem_id = #{mem_id}
select sum(p.pro_price * c.cart_amount) as total_price from cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p on c.pro_code = p.pro_code where c.mem_id = #{mem_id}
